Reviews.Title: Do not waste your money people!
Reviews.Author: True Dreamz
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed! I bought this phone a week ago and everything is wrong with it. the volume is terrible and sounds like those walkie talkies....arghhh please dont waste your money on this phone. And what is it with the welcome message "DEMON" in bold and red fonts? It creeps me out!!!Am very angry....

Reviews.Title: Best of Wrong and Bad
Reviews.Author: Juan D.
Reviews.Content: Slow processing info, take a loooong time to read the Sim Card, disgusting color projections, terrible colors quality, super expensive cases, disgusting quality sound, weak building, disgusting menu and poor quality options.I lost completely my money on this phone.

Reviews.Title: how do i return this.!
Reviews.Author: kristine
Reviews.Content: how do I return this phone? this is phone awfully sucks don't even waste your time looking at the features or waste your money buying it.

Reviews.Title: OMG Nightmare !!!
Reviews.Author: cricket
Reviews.Content: I bought two phones, one for my son and one for his best friend. These phones were NOT AT&T; compatible. I was so frustrated trying to get SIM cards for these phones and eventually both my son and his best friend sold these phones, and yes I did divulge all of the issues we had with these phones and AT&T; . My son lived the phone, but could not get service from AT&T; for them. Pkease make sure before you buy this phone that you will be able to get service from your preferred provider.

Reviews.Title: not a good buy
Reviews.Author: vap
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed in the purchase of this phone, its a waste of my time I would not recommend it to anyone it freeze up on me many times and cannot hold a good charge.

Reviews.Title: do not waste your money
Reviews.Author: Shannon Nicholson
Reviews.Content: this phone sucks. cant get 3g and looses what sucky internet it has.. just a rotten phone.. not a smart phone its a stupid phone. total waste of money spent

Reviews.Title: worse cell phone i ever owned
Reviews.Author: martin greene
Reviews.Content: first of all the manual that came with this piece of crap has no info on how to do things with the phone, a lot of the writing in this damn phone is in chinese, the battery life absolutely sucks, the battery runs down really fast even when you dont use the phone, its a pain in the butt to open and install the battery and sid card. i am really sorry i bought this piece of crap.

Reviews.Title: crappy phone
Reviews.Author: t.s.f rockett
Reviews.Content: The phone is crap and cell lot is a ripe off. To anyone reading this so not buy anything from cell lot.

Reviews.Title: WORST PHONE
Reviews.Author: Shan
Reviews.Content: got it for my niece birthday and everything is wrong with this phone.....no calls come in...keep losing the internet and i could go on bout it..........WORST BUY EVER ON AMAZON

WIFI: 802.11b/g wireless internet, FM/MP3/MP4/Bluetooth function supported
External memory: TF card up to 8GB (not included)
